CSSContain-intrinsic-block-size.summary: The contain-intrinsic-block-size CSS logical property defines the block size of an element that a browser can use for layout when the element is subject to size containment.

remarks.para: Block size is the size of an element in the dimension perpendicular to the flow of text within a line. In a horizontal writing mode like standard English, block size is the vertical dimension (height); in a vertical writing mode, block size is the horizontal dimension.
